name: Swagelok Company
tag_list: ball-valves, tube-fittings, regulators, quick-connects, stainless-steel-fittings, check-valves, fluid-system-technology, pressure-gauges, relief-valves, weld-fittings
overview: Swagelok is a leading provider of fluid system products and solutions worldwide with over 200 exclusive authorized sales and service centers located in 57 countries that cover 6 continents. Through our sales and service centers, we deliver knowledge, resources, innovations and value to customers worldwide.
